programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: Although a man claims he accidentally shot himself, the crime scene does not corroborate his story, and a love triangle unfolds.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: Police suspect a mother of two has relapsed into drugs when she disappears, but her family and friend suspect foul play.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: An accidental death in upstate New York becomes a possible murder scene, and a wife and mother provides a crucial piece of evidence; investigators confront the darkest side of humanity to discover an unspeakable truth.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: When a string of elderly people are brutally murdered in their homes along the Mississippi River, a Task Force is formed to hunt down a serial killer before they can strike again.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A gruesome, execution-style double murder of a young couple shakes a small mountain community in Eastern Tennessee; with no evidence or DNA left at the crime scene, police rely on the rumor mill and their instincts to try and identify suspects.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A kindhearted single mother is found brutally murdered, inside her own home; three potential suspects quickly arise, all claiming innocence, and it's up to the Largo Police detectives to find out who is the cold blooded killer.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A homicide of a beloved young coal miner sends shockwaves through a conservative mining community; as multiple suspects arise, detectives try to determine if the killing was a robbery gone wrong, a crime of passion, or possibly a hate crime.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: Devoted mother of two, Heather Strong, disappears, leaving her two children with her estranged husband, Josh; as Josh becomes an obvious suspect, an unlikely and sinister offender emerges.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: A community bands together to search for a missing woman; police are unable to solve the case until they speak to her husband's close friend and learn some startling information.

programme.title: Criminal Confessions
programme.desc: Kathy Lujan, a married mother of two young boys, is believed to have run away with one of her lover; Detective Rosie Rodriguez chases a trail of evidence and suspects that reveal the truth about Kathy's whereabouts.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A cat-loving and recently divorced young woman dipping her toes back in the dating game is beaten and strangled in a brutal and unusual way; investigators dive into the murky world of online dating to hunt a killer who could be ready to strike again.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: Detectives discover the badly beaten body of a single young woman left bizarrely staged on her bed; fear in the community grows amid a rash of nearby murders until police are handed a break when a fresh look at old evidence points to the killer.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A beloved teacher and mother of four silently vanishes in the middle of the night; a blood-soaked bedroom and lakeside discovery point police to a killer close to home until mysterious tracks in the mud lead to a culprit no one suspected.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a loving father of two is gunned down on his driveway, police uncover a hidden affair and workplace grudges before a nervous witness and chilling confession reveal a vicious vendetta from a killer no one expected.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a family that runs a beloved vet clinic is gunned down, police investigate disgruntled tenants, a pet owner with an ax to grind and an estranged son; the case stalls until detectives uncover a twisted plot by someone who seemed above suspicion.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a young mother and beloved coworker is found stabbed in her bedroom, investigators are unable to pin down a killer until secret recordings and evidence stashed in a van are found.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: An execution-style shooting of a well-loved, self-made couple; early leads take police down a path of greed and desperation until a paper trail leads to a calculated betrayal shockingly close to home.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: After a Texas mother is found murdered in an office bathroom, her husband admits a disturbing past while police chase down a serial killer; the case goes cold until an oversight leads to a surprise suspect and an FBI manhunt south of the border.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a devoted mother vanishes from home, a series of grisly roadside discoveries take police on a hunt for a killer; detectives follow a path of greed and desperation until a shocking twist leads to a culprit with a bizarre motive.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When an outgoing college student is gunned down, police investigate disapproving roommates, a psychic and an infamous serial killer; decades-old evidence reveals a killer that original detectives had previously overlooked.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: While investigating the murder of a devoutly religious couple, police uncover dark family secrets, leading them to a shocking suspect.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a popular college student is found slain in the middle of campus, police suspect his friends and lovers might be involved.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a suburban mom is murdered in her own home, investigators chase down an elusive killer that no one saw coming.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: Police in small town Louisiana investigate the mysterious and brutal murder of a beloved neighbor with no known enemies.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: After a college student is viciously murdered and her apartment set ablaze, police untangle a web of relationships to find a killer who's dangerously close to home.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A couple and their special needs son are savagely murdered in rural New Mexico, leading detectives to uncover long-buried secrets in a tight-knit town.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A devoted mother about to begin a new life is murdered in her own home; detectives follow the evidence through a tangled web of relationships to unmask the killer.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a loving father and beloved basketball coach is murdered in Tennessee, police decode a confusing array of evidence to unveil a killer who is shockingly close to home.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a devoted mother with a bright future in show business is ruthlessly gunned down, a number of suspects emerges; just as detectives think they have the killer in their sights, the investigation takes a jaw-dropping turn.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A wealthy businessman and his closest friend are found shot execution-style; police have little to go on until a surprising development leads investigators to a killer no one ever suspected.
